item.description:
Please join us for a small-group skill-share* on how to make mozzarella cheese at home! Rebecca will discuss the process and then the group will work together to make mozzarella and, of course, taste the results! 

Skill-share donation of $10 includes materials (milk, butter muslin, etc) as well as supports ongoing skill-share programming.

Space is limited but add yourself to the waiting list if this is full and we will see about accommodating more people.

-----------------

*Skill-shares are offered as a peer-to-peer way to exchange knowledge and skills among our members.  Have a skill to share?  Email the organizer of this meetup!

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Skill-share: Making Mozzarella at Home
